# GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/content | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/content ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-relationships-content)

-  GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/content 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/content

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-relationships-content#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/content
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-relationships-content#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-relationships-content#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[InAppPurchaseV2ContentLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/inapppurchasev2contentlinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-relationships-content#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-relationships-content#Endpoints)

[`Create an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v2-inapppurchases)Create an in-app purchase, including a consumable, non-consumable, or non-renewing subscription.[`Read In-App Purchase Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_)Get information about a specific in-app purchase.[`List All In-App Purchases for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-inapppurchasesv2)Get a list of the in-app purchases for a specific app.[`Modify an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v2-inapppurchases-_id_)Update the reference name of a specific in-app purchase.[`Delete an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v2-inapppurchases-_id_)Delete a specific in-app purchase from your app.[`List All Price Points for an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-pricepoints)Get a list of possible price points for an in-app purchase.[`GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/pricePoints`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-relationships-pricepoints)[`List all in-app purchase price point equalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-inapppurchasepricepoints-_id_-equalizations)Get a list of in-app purchase price points and their equivalent in a specified currency.[`GET /v1/inAppPurchasePricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-inapppurchasepricepoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations)[`Read Promoted Purchase Information for an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-promotedpurchase)Get details about the promoted purchase of an in-app purchase.[`GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/promotedPurchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-relationships-promotedpurchase)[`List All Localizations for an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-inapppurchaselocalizations)Get a list of localized display names and descriptions for a specific in-app purchase.[`GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/inAppPurchaseLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-relationships-inapppurchaselocalizations)[`Read Review Screenshot Information for an In-App Purchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-appstorereviewscreenshot)Get information about a review screenshot for a specific in-app purchase.[`GET /v2/inAppPurchases/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewScreenshot`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-inapppurchases-_id_-relationships-appstorereviewscreenshot)
